author: cnbc.com
title: Hailey Lee: CNBC Economics Producer
text:
Hailey is an Economics Producer, working with CNBC's Senior Economics Reporter Steve Liesman to cover the Federal Reserve, the U.S. economy and global economics. Lee was previously a segment producer on CNBC Power Lunch , where she booked and produced daily segments featuring high profile guests such as CEOs and top market strategists.
Lee joined CNBC as a rotating business news associate, spending several months at each of CNBC's editorial departments, including the assignment desk and CNBC.com. She has held editorial internships at Money Magazine , USA Today , CNBC Specials and Crain's Chicago Business .
Lee graduated from Wellesley College with a B.A. in Economics and International Relations. She was also cross registered at MIT.
Follow Hailey Lee on Twitter @ haileylee139 and LinkedIn haileyleejournalist .
